Author: mithro_
Content:
I believe I have the changes which mean I can use multiple machines to run precheck commands (and also update the server code without killing currently running prechecks).

I have picked up a couple of EX63 hetzner servers with Intel Core Ultra 7 265 Arrow Lake and 192GB memory to run the prechecks. 

AI says they are 4,663 single threaded performance compared to the current 1,200 single threaded performance. 

I'm just working on testing everything with test-platform.wafer.space before deploying it to the production platform.wafer.space

Author: mithro_
Content: I'll have an update about the deadline in the #announcements and to the mailing list shortly.
